Package com.example.bubbletracksapp

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
com.example.bubbletracksapp.Admin
public class Admin extends Object
Admin class to manage administrative actions like deleting events and profiles from Firestore and handling related updates for both events and profiles.

    Constructor to initialize the Admin class with the provided context.

    void
    deleteEntrant(android.content.Context context, Entrant entrantToDelete)

  • Constructor Details

    • Admin

      public Admin(android.content.Context context)
      Constructor to initialize the Admin class with the provided context.
      Parameters:
      context - The context where the Admin actions will take place (e.g., Activity or Application context).

  • Method Details

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(android.content.Context context, Event event)
      Deletes an event from the "events" collection and removes references to the event from the corresponding lists in the "entrants" collection.
      Parameters:
      context - The context where the deletion is being performed.
      event - The event that needs to be deleted.

    • deleteEntrant

      public void deleteEntrant(android.content.Context context, Entrant entrantToDelete)
      Deletes an entrant's profile from the "entrants" collection and removes any references to the profile from the corresponding lists in the "events" collection. Deletes associated facility, which deletes organized events
      Parameters:
      context - The context where the deletion is being performed.
      entrantToDelete - The entrant object whose profile needs to be deleted.

    • deleteFacility

      public void deleteFacility(android.content.Context context, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference facilityRef)
      Deletes a facility from the "facilities" Deletes all events associated with the facility. Removes facility reference from the organizer's document. Updates the organizer's role to "entrant".
      Parameters:
      context - The context where the deletion is being performed.
      facilityRef - The DocumentReference to the facility that needs to be deleted.

    • removeHashData

      public void removeHashData(android.content.Context context, Event event)
      Removes The hash QRCode data
      Parameters:
      context - The context this deletion occurs
      event - The event who's QR code is to be deleted
